Html:
I'm officially retiring from Rawr. I've loved working on it over the years and I've learned a lot.

Thank You.
So this one is for reals.  Sorry to see you go, you've been a good guiding hand for the project.
You have been pushing pretty hard over the last few months.  Thank you for your guidance.  I have learned a lot from you.
Thanks for helping me get set up and started as a developer here.  Good luck with things, I hope you still pop in now and then!
